data: Qui est Karim D. ? Ce jeune écrivain engagé au succès annoncé ou son alias, Arthur Rambo, qui poste des messages haineux que l’on exhume un jour des réseaux sociaux… (I am sharp and wise. I know poetry and politics. I raised from a social underworld to an exposed position as a provocative Parisian author. I published a novel but I also write in 140 signs on social media. And when I do, I hit my target. That's why they all me want out!)
Qui est Karim D. ? Ce jeune écrivain engagé au succès annoncé ou son alias, Arthur Rambo, qui poste des messages haineux que l’on exhume un jour des réseaux sociaux…

I am sharp and wise. I know poetry and politics. I raised from a social underworld to an exposed position as a provocative Parisian author. I published a novel but I also write in 140 signs on social media. And when I do, I hit my target. That's why they all me want out!
